mapper.insert: INSERT INTO market_qna( qna_title, member_no, category_name, qna_content )VALUES( #{qnaTitle}, 1, #{categoryName}, #{qnaContent} )
mapper.select: SELECT qna_title qnaTitle, member_no memberNo, category_name categoryName, qna_content qnaContent FROM market_qna WHERE qna_title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%') ORDER BY qna_title DESC
SELECT qna_title qnaTitle, member_no memberNo, category_name categoryName, qna_content qnaContent FROM market_qna WHERE qna_title=#{qnaTitle}
